name: Brussels Aviation School (BAS)
about: Brussels Aviation School (BAS) is a premier flight training institution in Belgium, dedicated to producing highly skilled and safety-conscious pilots. Established through a partnership with Brussels Airlines and Skywings Flight Training, BAS offers a comprehensive Multi Pilot Licence (MPL) program that prepares cadets for careers with major airlines. Our training is conducted according to the stringent standards of the European Aviation Safety Agency (EASA) and includes both ground school and flight training on advanced simulators and aircraft. With a faculty of experienced aviation professionals, BAS ensures that students receive top-tier education and hands-on training, enabling them to seamlessly transition into roles as first officers. Our program is designed to be completed in 19 months, making it a efficient and affordable path to a career in aviation. At BAS, we are committed to excellence and safety, and we look forward to welcoming aspiring pilots to our community.
